summary: **Captain Marvel (2019):** This superhero movie is about a powerful woman named Carol Danvers, who becomes Captain Marvel. Set in 1995, the story shows how she gains her superpowers and saves Earth from a galactic war. It stars Brie Larson and Samuel L. Jackson. The film was made by Marvel Studios and is part of their popular series of superhero movies. It made over $1 billion and got good reviews, especially for Larson's acting. A sequel, *The Marvels*, came out in 2023.
title: Captain Marvel (film)
